body:
For the record, the `SYNC` instructions required by what Keith is talking about are in https://golang.org/src/runtime/internal/atomic/asm_ppc64x.s and https://golang.org/src/runtime/internal/atomic/atomic_ppc64x.s .

On the one hand, we could certainly be doing something wrong, and it would be great if you could analyze our code and verify that it works.  On the other hand, we aren't new at this stuff; we do pretty much know what we're doing.
